Below is a review of the game "Phat Cats Megaways".

Please provide the following:

- Bullet lists briefly covering the topic "What we like". (4 bullet points)
- Bullet lists briefly covering the topic "What we don't like". (2 bullet pints)
- SEO optimized meta title with a maximum length of 45 characters. Include the words "play" and "free". Capitalize according to AP rules.
- SEO optimized, neutral meta description, explaining the review with a maximum length of 20 words. Include the words "play" and "free".

Respond with a JSON using the keys "pros" (simple array), "cons" (simple array), "meta_title" and "meta_description". 

Review:
 
Megaways feature

Phat Cats Megaways is known for its unique Megaways feature, which offers up to 117,649 ways to win on every spin. This feature is innovative and can make the game incredibly rewarding.

Bonus features

Phat Cats Megaways offers several exciting bonus features, including free spins and cascading reels. The free spins can be triggered by landing three or more bonus symbols, and the cascading reels can potentially lead to multiple winning combinations on a single spin.

Gameplay

The gameplay in Phat Cats Megaways is challenging and engaging. The game is fast-paced, and it can keep players entertained for hours at a time. The Megaways feature adds an extra layer of excitement, as it allows for a large number of paylines and potential winning combinations.

Graphics and animations

The graphics and animations in Phat Cats Megaways are impressive and eye-catching. The game has a fun and playful theme, with cartoonish cats and bright colors. The animations are smooth and add to the overall gaming experience.

Responsible gambling

As with any gambling activity, it is important to play Phat Cats Megaways responsibly and within your means. Set a budget before playing and stick to it. Do not chase losses or spend more than you can afford to lose. The game offers various betting options, including a demo mode, which can be used to play the game without risking any real money.
